full_summary:
# Request for Proposal: Governance Expert Services
## Tender Information
### Title:
Needs Analysis and Research Consultant (2 Governance Experts)
- Title (English): Needs Analysis and Research Consultant (2 Governance Experts)
- Title (French): Expert-conseil en analyse des besoins et en recherche (2 experts en gouvernance)

### Reference Number:
cb-821-14465264

### Description:
The Net-Zero Advisory Body Secretariat in the Climate Change Branch (CCB) of Environment and Climate Change Canada (ECCC) seeks the services of two governance experts: one Level 3 (Senior) and one Level 1 (Junior) consultant under TSPS stream 2.7 Needs Analysis and Research Consultant.

#### Key Responsibilities:

* Provide research and analysis to inform the Net-Zero Advisory Body’s advice to the Minister of Environment and Climate Change, as detailed in the Statement of Work, Annex A to the bid solicitation.

#### Professional Service Requirements:

* Business and Corporate Management Consultancy Services
* Government Affairs and Community Relations Consultation Services

#### Procurement Information:
- Procurement Method: Competitive – Selective Tendering
- Tender Closing Date: 2023-11-16, 14:00:00 (Eastern Standard Time)
- Contracting Entity: Environment and Climate Change Canada

#### Attachment:

* https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/22422/amd002---5000075406---qa---en_fr.pdf
* https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/22422/amd-to-rfp-005-en_fr.pdf
* https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/22422/5000075406---npp.pdf

 #### Contact Information:
 Anne-Marie Boucher
 anne-marie.boucher@ec.gc.ca
 (819) 307-7492

 Original attachment contained 8 full documents which seemed to be bid documents already, only relevant information were kept to fit in 400 words as requested. Original unrambled document still attached on outputs for reference.
